title: Protect up to 10 devices with a discounted lifetime license to FastestVPN
description: Keep your personal data private with a FastestVPN 10-device lifetime license for $31.97. That's a whopping 88% off the $360 MSRP. (via Cult of Mac - Your source for the latest Apple news, rumors, analysis, reviews, how-tos and deals.)
author: Cult of Mac Deals
excerpt: Keep your personal data private with a FastestVPN 10-device lifetime license for $31.97. That's a whopping 88% off the $360 MSRP.
text: Deals Keep all your Apple devices safe with a low one-time payment. Photo: Cult of Mac Deals The more devices you own, the more difficulty you will encounter in protecting your privacy from malicious actors and sanctioned snoops. This heavily discounted FastestVPN lifetime license guards up to 10 of your devices, from your MacBook to your iPhone. FastestVPN blocks snoops and hackers Virtual private networks route your traffic through another server before connecting to the internet. Use a VPN, and anybody checking your IP address or trying to track you back to your home device stalls out at the server. FastestVPN adds to this security by encoding your traffic with 256-bit AES encryption. Plus, an NAT firewall helps keep out malicious actors. On the software side, FastestVPN’s built-in ad blockers and malware scanners prevent attacks and ensure a smoother experience with no drag. There’s even a no-log policy so not even your VPN operator knows what you’re doing. A multidevice VPN that’s easy to deploy — for life Each FastestVPN license is issued for lifetime use and can be used on up to 10 different devices, with support for iOS, macOS, Windows, Android, smart TVs, routers and more. Bandwidth is unlimited, and you can switch servers anytime with no restrictions. You can use all your protected devices simultaneously, so you won’t need to trade off on security. FastestVPN utilizes more than 550 servers around the world, so you can always tap into your subscription without running into any geographic restrictions. Servers are also optimized for peer-to-peer use, and you can choose your preferred VPN protocol for maximum convenience. Split tunneling lets you sort out which apps need VPN access and which don’t. Smart Connect tools can automatically pick the right server for you as well. Save on a FastestVPN lifetime license for 10 devices Keep your personal data private with this deep discount on a FastestVPN 10-device lifetime license. Snag it for just $31.97. That’s a whopping 91% off the $360 MSRP. Price drop ends at 11:59 p.m. on June 26, 2024. Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackCommerce, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackCommerce directly. We originally published this FastestVPN deal on July 26, 2023. We updated the pricing info.
html:
• Deals

The more devices you own, the more difficulty you will encounter in protecting your privacy from malicious actors and sanctioned snoops. This heavily discounted FastestVPN lifetime license guards up to 10 of your devices, from your MacBook to your iPhone.

FastestVPN blocks snoops and hackers

Virtual private networks route your traffic through another server before connecting to the internet. Use a VPN, and anybody checking your IP address or trying to track you back to your home device stalls out at the server. FastestVPN adds to this security by encoding your traffic with 256-bit AES encryption. Plus, an NAT firewall helps keep out malicious actors.

On the software side, FastestVPN’s built-in ad blockers and malware scanners prevent attacks and ensure a smoother experience with no drag. There’s even a no-log policy so not even your VPN operator knows what you’re doing.

A multidevice VPN that’s easy to deploy — for life

Each FastestVPN license is issued for lifetime use and can be used on up to 10 different devices, with support for iOS, macOS, Windows, Android, smart TVs, routers and more. Bandwidth is unlimited, and you can switch servers anytime with no restrictions. You can use all your protected devices simultaneously, so you won’t need to trade off on security.

FastestVPN utilizes more than 550 servers around the world, so you can always tap into your subscription without running into any geographic restrictions. Servers are also optimized for peer-to-peer use, and you can choose your preferred VPN protocol for maximum convenience. Split tunneling lets you sort out which apps need VPN access and which don’t. Smart Connect tools can automatically pick the right server for you as well.

Save on a FastestVPN lifetime license for 10 devices

Keep your personal data private with this deep discount on a FastestVPN 10-device lifetime license. Snag it for just $31.97. That’s a whopping 91% off the $360 MSRP. Price drop ends at 11:59 p.m. on June 26, 2024.

Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals

Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackCommerce, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackCommerce directly. We originally published this FastestVPN deal on July 26, 2023. We updated the pricing info.
